name: Greenville Capoeira
notes: Taylors, South Carolina. Weekly classes for Capoeira Angola or Capoeira Regional in Taylors, SC near Greenville and Greer, every Fri and Sat around 6-9. Email adeoninc@gmail.com. Also a new group meeting Wed 6pm at Falls Park in downtown Greenville grassy area, email leeinsc@hotmail.com. SOURCE: offline capoeira forum
rawRecord:
"We have weekly classes for anyone interested in Capoeira Angola or
Capoeira
Regional in Taylors, SC which is near Greenville and Greer, we have
classes
every Fri and Sat around 6-9 or so, for more information email me at
adeoninc@gmail.com"
"We have started a new capoeira group in Greenville, SC!!! We are meeting
at
6pm on Wed right now. We are meeting at the Falls Park in downtown
Greenville in the grassy area down the stairs from the walking bridge.
We
would like as many people as possible to come join us!!!
Please come or email me at leeinsc@hotmail.com
for more info"
SOURCE:  offline capoeira forum

name: Dragao de Capoeira
notes: Brownsville, Texas. Instructor: Pirata (Tiffany Smith). Website and email for this group are no longer working; please contact us. 10/8/05. It may asked why we are including information that is so clearly out of date, not to mention the fact that the instructor's qualifications to teach were dubious at best. We were well aware that she should not have been included when we first heard from her. and that even if she had been a legitimate instructor, the information is now so out of date that it certainly should be removed. All we can say is that we are total suckers for people who begged to be included. Sorry if anyone is offended. 8/4/19. SOURCE: email 11/26/03
